rooms.description: A spacious entryway with Art Deco elements, featuring geometric patterns and streamlined furniture. Positioned according to Vastu principles to welcome positive energy.

A large living room designed in an Art Deco style with ornamental details and symmetry. It serves as the main area for relaxation, ensuring ample natural light from south-facing windows per Vastu guidelines.
A formal dining space that complements the living room with Art Deco finishes. It is located in a prime position for family meals, adhering to spatial harmony as per Vastu principles.
A modern kitchen area integrated into the dining space with efficient layout and Art Deco details. It is designed for optimal workflow and safety in accordance with local building norms.
A spacious balcony adjacent to each bedroom on the ground floor, offering outdoor space with elegant Art Deco railings. It ensures natural ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Main entrance door located in the northern part of the apartment for auspicious entry according to Vastu principles.
Large windows facing the south-east to maximize sunlight and ventilation.
Access door leading to the ground-floor balcony, providing an outdoor living space.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a dedicated Art Deco balcony, built-in storage and decorative mouldings. The layout is aligned according to Vastu principles for optimal energy flow.
Second bedroom designed in the Art Deco style with a spacious balcony. It features natural light and ventilation, ensuring adherence to Vastu guidelines.
Third bedroom with an Art Deco aesthetic and a private balcony for fresh air. The room layout follows Vastu principles to enhance serenity.
Fourth bedroom with a balcony, decorated in Art Deco style and planned according to local building norms and Vastu guidelines for optimum living conditions.
A quiet, well-lit library designed with elegant Art Deco finishes. Positioned on the first floor to provide a calm environment away from household noise.

openings.description: Access door leading to the spacious balconies of each bedroom, designed for natural light and ventilation.
Large windows ensuring ample daylight and adherence to Vastu principles.

rooms.description: A dedicated area for a swimming pool designed with Art Deco detailing and landscaping. The location is chosen to optimize views and comply with local building norms.
A spacious terrace that provides additional outdoor space, complementing the overall Art Deco design of the apartment.

openings.description: Access door leading to the swimming pool area and surrounding terrace for a seamless transition between indoor and outdoor spaces.
Strategically placed windows that enhance natural lighting and maintain Vastu harmony.

additional_notes: This floor plan is designed with Indian residential norms, local building regulations, and Vastu principles in mind. The design emphasizes Art Deco aesthetics through geometric patterns, streamlined furniture, and elegant detailing across both residential and recreational spaces. Each room's area has been allocated to ensure functionality while maintaining harmony as per traditional guidelines.
